text: Indeed, my Lord is upon a straight path. I have turned my face toward He who created the heavens and the earth, inclining toward truth, and I am not of those who associate others with Allah.
And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace.
O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
context: On the purpose of the Prophet Muhammad's mission

text: There shall be no compulsion in [acceptance of] the religion. The right course has become clear from the wrong.
